title: Hello, Magnolia - Live from Magnolia, Mississippi
description:
Kirk and MinifansÂ from all over the country gather in Magnolia, Mississippi for what Kirk declared, "best live show yet." Broadcasting from Le Mariposa in the heart of Magnolia, we hear from owner Mercedes, Guy Geller & a welcomed special guest that shocked the crowd. Kirk details the fallout from the Howie Carr phone call from last week, more on Harrison's status with KMS & much more!


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
